home.find.description:
Find the best therapy for you from 50+ registered, professional therapists. 
 Same-day appointments are available.
home.book.description:
Choose how you want to connect - either by video, chat, phone or in-person. 
 Simply click to book your therapy session.
home.guarantee.description:
If you're not satisfied, we'll arrange a free session with an alternative therapist for you. 
 Our team is available to help you with every step.

register.description: In order to complete the subscription process, simply check your inbox and click on the link in the email we have just sent you. If it is not there, please check your junk mail folder and if it is in the junk mail folder, remember to mark the email as 'not junk'. {breakingLine} If you still experience difficulties when subscribing to the newsletter, please contact us at info[at]sharing.org {breakingLine}This confirmation process is used for security reasons.

page.contact.title: Get In Touch
page.contact.description: If you have any questions, feedback, or any ideas that you’d like to share with us, please fill out the form below and we’ll be happy to help! The beta version is especially intended for your feedback to improve the platform, so don’t hesitate to let us know what you think!
page.about.description1: AloPal is an online platform, delivering a variety of services to all the Farsi speaking communities around the globe. It is created to ease off the burden of being an immigrant and to solve the unique struggles that come with it. Immigration is more than just a relocation; it involves questions of a sense of identity and belongingness, and the accessibility to certain resources. With this in mind, AloPal was designed to cater to those who embrace the idea of receiving quality services from their homeland.
page.about.description2: We have been extremely careful about the experts we select as your Pals, to ensure exceptional outcomes. Furthermore, we have developed a research team, in charge of studying the needs of immigrants. This way, not only we’re able to update and expand our services to tailor to your needs, but we’re also hoping to add value to the research on immigration. Last but not least, creating a sense of community on a virtual platform was paramount. We wanted to make a community of Farsi-speaking people in diaspora. By joining, you partake in making a global community, and as the community becomes bigger, AloPal will cover more of your needs, and will lead to more exchanges.
